comments:
Went into repository explorer, branches, selected a branch, open down two
levels, rc'd folder, check out as, click finish.  Check out will checkout based
on the head.  This is non-intuitive when you are exploring a branch and checkout
the default tag should be the branch you are within.

Also got these exceptions...
